assumptions.description: LLM-based INCOSE rule checking can reliably automate ~24 of 42 syntactic rules; remaining semantic rules require human review
assumptions.basis: QRA Corp QVscribe research; Innoslate caps at 78% automated

assumptions.description: Concept-dev outputs provide sufficient starting material to seed INCOSE-compliant needs and requirements with user refinement
assumptions.basis: concept-dev artifacts contain functional blocks, stakeholders, constraints, research sources — standard NRM inputs

assumptions.description: Subsystem decomposition and allocation can be scaffolded by an LLM with guided prompts, but engineering judgment for budgeting and allocation rationale must come from the user
assumptions.basis: No precedent for LLM-automated requirements allocation; INCOSE NRM 6.4 requires quantitative engineering judgment

assumptions.description: Software-only focus is compatible with INCOSE practices without significant adaptation
assumptions.basis: INCOSE practices are domain-agnostic; SaSIWG working group addresses software; Visure confirms IT/Agile adaptation

assumptions.description: Solo developers and small teams will accept INCOSE-level rigor if the process is guided and conversational
assumptions.basis: Concept-dev already uses guided metered questioning successfully; this is a graduation in rigor

assumptions.description: The requirements-dev output will provide sufficient input for a downstream system-design skill
assumptions.basis: INCOSE requirements are standard inputs to system design; concept-dev pipeline already structures this handoff

assumptions.description: Research-assisted TPM guidance with grounded baselines is more valuable than arbitrary developer-chosen targets
assumptions.basis: User explicitly requested this; INCOSE R33/R34 require ranges and measurable performance

assumptions.description: Block-centric organization maps naturally to concept-dev's BLACKBOX.md structure
assumptions.basis: Concept-dev already organizes by functional block; users have this mental model

assumptions.description: Type-guided passes produce more complete requirements than freeform writing
assumptions.basis: INCOSE NRM 6.2.1.2 recommends considering each type; guided approach prevents omission

assumptions.description: Re-entrant core can operate at multiple abstraction levels without modification
assumptions.basis: INCOSE NRM 6.4 describes same process at different levels; attributes and patterns are level-agnostic
